leadership.name: Mohammad Adnan
leadership.bio: With over 3 years of experience in software engineering, Adnan leads AppZad's technical vision and client relationships. Specialized in building scalable web applications for the travel and hospitality industries.

team.bio: Sarah brings 5 years of design expertise, specializing in creating intuitive interfaces for healthcare and wellness platforms.

team.bio: Rajesh specializes in building robust backend systems and APIs for travel booking platforms and hotel management systems.

team.bio: Emily focuses on creating pixel-perfect, responsive interfaces with a keen eye for performance optimization.

team.name: Michael Brown
team.bio: Michael ensures smooth project delivery and client communication, with expertise in Agile methodologies.
